Package org.forgerock.openam.radius.server.monitoring

Interface RadiusServerEventRegistrator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RadiusServerEventRegistrar
    public interface RadiusServerEventRegistrator
    Interface through which implementations that monitor the state of the Radius Server can update the state by notifying the implementation of events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long authRequestAccepted()
      Notify the event Registrar that an auth request has been accepted.
      long authRequestRejected()
      Notify the event Registrar that an auth request has been rejected.
      long packetAccepted()
      Notify the Event Registrar that a packet has been understood and hence 'accepted'.
      long packetProcessed()
      Notify the event Registrar that a packet has been processed.
      long packetReceived()
      Report to the Event Registrar that a packet has been received.

    • Method Detail

      • packetReceived

        long packetReceived()
        Report to the Event Registrar that a packet has been received.
        Returns:
        the total number of packets received (including the one being reported).

      • packetAccepted

        long packetAccepted()
        Notify the Event Registrar that a packet has been understood and hence 'accepted'.
        Returns:
        the total number of packets accepted (including the one being reported).

      • packetProcessed

        long packetProcessed()
        Notify the event Registrar that a packet has been processed. The authentication may have succeeded, or failed, but it has been processed to completion.
        Returns:
        the total number of packets that have been processed.

      • authRequestAccepted

        long authRequestAccepted()
        Notify the event Registrar that an auth request has been accepted. That is an AccessAccept packet has been sent to the client in response to the AccessRequest.
        Returns:
        the total number of authentication requests that have been accepted.

      • authRequestRejected

        long authRequestRejected()
        Notify the event Registrar that an auth request has been rejected. That is, an AccessReject packet has been sent to the client in response to the AccessRequest.
        Returns:
        the total number of authentication requests that have been rejected.
